short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto currencies price and volume monitoring tool. Get the latest data from Binance, Uniswap, PancakeSwap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cryptocurrency price and volume monitoring tool. Automatically sending notifications based on user configurations.
- Get the latest data from Top trading pairs in Binance, Uniswap, PancakeSwap.
- Notifies when the price is changed based on user configuration.
- Notifies when trading volume is changed based on user configuration.
- Notifies when Binance has a new cryptocurrency listing
